name: Fracktal Works Dual Printer Base Description

machine_end_gcode.default_value:
;End GCode
M104 T0 S0 ;extruder heater off
M104 T1 S0 ;extruder heater off
M140 S0 ;heated bed heater off (if you have it)
G91 ;relative positioning
G1 E-1 F300 ;retract the filament a bit before lifting the nozzle, to release some of the pressure
G1 Z+0.5 E-5 X-20 Y-20 F3000 ;move Z up a bit and retract filament even more
G28;move X/Y to min endstops, so the head is out of the way
M84 ;steppers off
M107
G90 ;absolute positioning

machine_start_gcode.default_value:
;Machine Model: {machine_name} 
;Nozzles used: {'T0 ' + str(extruderValue(0, 'machine_nozzle_size'))  + ' T1 ' + str(extruderValue(1, 'machine_nozzle_size'))}
;Sliced at: {day} {date} {time}
G21 ;metric values
M107
G28
M420 S1
G90 ;absolute positioning
G1 X0 Y0 Z5 F5000 ;move nozzle up 5mm for safe homing
T0;always start probe with T0
G29;ABL
M500
M82 ;set extruder to absolute mode
M107 ;start with the fan off
G1 X0 Y0 Z15.0 F5000 ;move the platform down 15mm

; Extrude purge line

G92 E0 ; reset extruder position
G0 Z0.2 F500 ; purge
G0 X15 E4 F500 ; purge
G92 E0 ; reset extruder position
G0 X25 E4 F650 ; purge
G92 E0 ; reset extruder position
G0 X35 E4 F800 ; purge
G0 X{35 + 3} Z{0.05} F{8000} ; wipe, move close to the bed
G0 X{35 + 3 * 2} Z0.2 F{8000} ; wipe, move quickly away from the bed

G92 E0 ; zero the extruded length again

soluble_support_placement.description: Print all support structures with soluable support, or place soluable support only on interface?
soluble_support_placement.label: Soluble Support Optimisation
